name: Super MineSweeper HD Free
description:
The popular game Super MineSweeper is now on iPad. The whole user interface is re-made to take advantage of the iPad high resolution screen, the game play experience is now much better.

Super MineSweeper is a classic logic puzzle game. In addition to the classic square board, Super MineSweeper supports hexagon grid board that make the game even more entertaining and challenging.

Features:
- 2 board types: square grid, hexagon grid
- 3 board sizes:
small - beginne
medium - intermediate
large - expert
- OpenFeint supported leader board
- Support for landscape and portrait screen orientation

This is the ads supported free version. To remove the ads, please buy the full version.
